com.cyc.baseclient.util

Class PasswordManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cyc.baseclient.util.PasswordManager

  • public class PasswordManager
extends Object

    PasswordManager is designed to handle password encryption, authentication ,etc.

      • areLoginCredentialsValid

        public boolean areLoginCredentialsValid(CycConstantImpl user,
                               DenotationalTerm applicationTerm,
                               char[] unencryptedPassword)
        Verify that a user/password combination for an application is valid.
        Parameters:
        user -
        applicationTerm -
        unencryptedPassword -
        Returns:
        true iff Cyc verifies the authenticity of the login credentials.

      • isPasswordRequired

        public Boolean isPasswordRequired()
                           throws CycConnectionException
        Does the Cyc Image require authentication before allowing a user access?
        Throws:

      • updatePassword

        public boolean updatePassword(CycConstantImpl user,
                     DenotationalTerm applicationTerm,
                     char[] unencryptedPassword)
        Update the password for the specified user and application.
        Parameters:
        user - the user whose password is to be updated
        applicationTerm - the application for which the user's password is to be updated.
        unencryptedPassword - the new password
        Returns:
        true iff Cyc signals the password has been successfully updated.

      • encryptPassword

        Encrypt a user/password combination using Cyc's standard password encryption.
        Parameters:
        unencryptedPassword -
        user -
        Returns:
        the encrypted password

      • lookupPassword

        public String lookupPassword(CycConstantImpl user,
                    DenotationalTerm applicationTerm)
        Look up the (encrypted) password for user using application. This will only find passwords that have been entered into this application.
        Parameters:
        user -
        applicationTerm -
        Returns:
        the *encrypted* password, or null if it is not known.
